site_name: Public realm land to the south of Kensington Aldridge Academy, 1 Silchester Road, LONDON, W10 6EX
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 22 (Kensington Aldridge Academy and Public Realm Phase III Remediation Strategy) of planning permission 12/01833 (Demolition of existing leisure centre and associated sports pitch facilities to facilitate redevelopment to provide a new Leisure Centre of 9,570 sqm (within use class D2), the construction of a new Academy of 12,749 sqm (within use class D1) with associated facilities, the construction of a new residential block to provide 32 units (use class C3) with a basement car park and the provision of hard and soft landscaping across the site with up to 31 on-site and on-street car parking spaces, and 2 coach bays provided. (Major Application)) ***WITHDRAWN***
